sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya akan dihubungi oleh bos.
english translation: "I will be contacted by my boss."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Informasi ini sudah diketahui oleh semua orang.
english translation: "This information is already known by everyone."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Dia diikuti oleh sekelompok orang.
english translation: "He is followed by a group of people."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Paket ini disertai dengan bonus tambahan.
english translation: "This package is accompanied by an additional bonus."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Prestasi mereka diakui oleh semua orang.
english translation: "Their achievements are acknowledged by everyone."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Rumah ini dimiliki oleh keluarga kami.
english translation: "This house is owned by our family."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Barang-barang ini dilengkapi dengan fitur canggih.
english translation: "These items are equipped with advanced features."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Kucingku ditemui di taman depan rumah.
english translation: "My cat was found in the front yard."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Kegagalan ini dialami oleh banyak orang.
english translation: "This failure is experienced by many people."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Acara itu dihadiri oleh ratusan peserta.
english translation: "The event was attended by hundreds of participants."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Masalah ini akan ditangani oleh tim teknis.
english translation: "This issue will be handled by the technical team."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Rumah mereka dikelilingi oleh pepohonan hijau.
english translation: "Their house is surrounded by green trees."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Anak lelakinya dinamai Michael.
english translation: "Their son is named Michael."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya pergi ke pesta tersebut didampingi oleh teman baikku.
english translation: "I went to the party accompanied by my good friend."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Ruang tamu ini dipenuhi dengan barang-barang antik.
english translation: "This living room is filled with antique items."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Tempat ini ditandai dengan tanda agar mudah ditemukan.
english translation: "This place is marked with a sign for easy identification."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Area ini harus dilindungi dari gangguan.
english translation: "This area should be protected from any disturbance."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Keputusan ini dipengaruhi oleh penelitian terbaru.
english translation: "This decision is influenced by the latest research."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Tradisi ini diyakini membawa keberuntungan.
english translation: "This tradition is believed to bring luck."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Materi ini harus dipahami sebelum mengikuti ujian.
english translation: "This material needs to be understood before taking the exam."
